isis.stitle: TSI 02-13-04R - Transmission Control Wire Harness Routing Revision with Meritor® "G" Series Transmissions in 2000, 8000, and 9000 Models Built Between April 1, 2000 and May 31, 2002

subjectgroup.subject: Transmission Control Wire Harness Routing Revision with Meritor® "G" Series Transmissions in 2000, 8000, and 9000 Models Built Between April 1, 2000 and May 31, 2002

geninfo.para: Wire harness routing for the shift control on Meritor® "G" series transmission in 2000, 8000, and 9000 Models built between April 1, 2000 and May 31, 2002 should be rerouted to achieve more gradual harness bend near the lift eye. Harness slack will be in the area between the P-clip and the shift tower. Refer to Figure 1 for recommended harness routing when servicing the transmission.

warning.para: To prevent property damage or personal injury park the vehicle on a level surface, set the parking brake, chock the wheels, and turn the engine off.

step1.para: Route transmission wire harness leaving slack as shown in Figure 1.
